short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the description field in Jira to be RTL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Jira experience with the Toggle RTL for Jira extension! This handy tool allows you to effortlessly switch the description field in Jira issues to right-to-left (RTL) text direction, making it perfect for users who work with RTL languages like Arabic, Hebrew, and Persian.

Key Features:

Toggle On/Off: Easily enable or disable RTL text direction for the description field with a single click.
Seamless Integration: Works seamlessly with Jira, updating the text direction in real-time.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive popup interface for quick access and control.
Whether you're managing projects, reporting bugs, or tracking tasks, Toggle RTL for Jira ensures your text is always displayed correctly, improving readability and productivity. Download now and enhance your Jira workflow!"

Feel free to modify or expand on these descriptions to better suit your needs or to highlight additional features of your extension.
